title: Can someone rely on ExamFear for the 12th board exams? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, they sure can. I have recommend Examfear to all my cousins and family friends. Not even one of them said anything against it. Examfear has all the necessary content for class 12th. The notes are there, the videos are there. And when you ask a doubt, it is answered within 48 hours. Moreover, they give timely tips which really helps the students. I know students who didn't study through out the year and managed to get 70–80% by just watching Examfear videos during the last few months. You can totally rely on Examfear’s fourstep learning program for your boards. Study on time, make a proper time table and I don't see why you won't flare in your exams.
